title: @Riot , When Is anything about the new Poppy going to be revealed?
body:
After dumping days into my favorite champion it's really draining waiting months and still not knowing anything about it. i check every day for an update. 

Since Poppy as we know is getting removed, I'm sure me and every other poppy main would like some idea of what new "Poppy" she is getting replaced by.

replies.body: They said something about keeping her dive-heavy playstyle intact, but nothing more. She is next on the list, which is nice.
yeah it is pretty nice, but that's also what is making the wait so hard. looking for something everyday :p

I found something.
http://www.newsoflegends.com/index.php/tag/poppy/
Apparently, they're keeping her E, changing her ult and passive, and keeping 'low health tankiness'. Not much, but it's something.
